Title: Donate to Charity
Description: Donate $2.5M to Tech-Up, a nonprofit organization that helps underprivileged kids get a proper STEM education. This will increase your reputation by 3.

Title: Collect Data from Users
Description: Get a $4M cash boost by selling Botnet user's data to a third party data collection company. This will increase the risk of a scandal.

Title: Increase Funding to Cybersecurity
Description: Increase funding to your Cybersecurity department by $2.5M. Reduce chance of a cyber attack in the future by 45%.

Title: Add a Mech Upgrade Facility
Description: Spend $2M to create a facility that will allow Botnet to add upgrades to their mechs.

Title: Give Workers Free Food
Description: Spend $4M to add free-food facilities to all of Botnet's mech production facilities to improve worker's morale.

Title: Cut Costs on Restrooms
Description: Gain $5M by removing feminine hygiene products from restrooms, replacing toilet paper with single ply toilet paper, and removing family restrooms. This will anger many of your employees.

Title: Recruit a Cyber Security Specialist
Description: Spend $3M to hire a renowned cybersecurity specialist that has applied for Lead Security at Botnet. She's one of the best in her field and would no doubt improve Botnet's cybersecurity, but is known for sometimes ignoring company policies and doing things her own way, which will increase your chance of scandal slightly.

Title: Recruit a Public Relations Specialist
Description: Spend $2.5M to hire a skilled Public Relations Manager for Botnet. This will increase Botnet's reputation by 2.

Title: Sell Mechs for Parade
Description: Gain $6M by developing and selling several lavish mechs to Shokrai for their annual military parade. This will decrease Botnet's reputation by 4, as Shokrai is viewed by a lot of the world as a country that violates many human rights.

Title: Fire Troublesome Manager
Description: Spend $3M to replace a critical executive manager who has been internally badmouthing Botnet and occasionally breaking company protocol. This will decrease the chance of Botnet having a scandal.

Title: Research Mech 'C.L.U.T.S.'
Description: Spend $3.5M putting resources into research for a new mech. After this quarter you will be able to develop the mech 'C.L.U.T.S.,' a heavily reinforced mech used for destroying large structures.

Title: Research Mech 'A.C.E.'
Description: Spend $5.5M putting resources into research for a new mech. After this quarter you will be able to develop the mech 'A.C.E.,' an agile humanoid mech that acts as a large extension of the human body.

Title: Mech Return
Description: Some people are not happy with their mechs and want to return them. Pay 3M for shipping but gain 3 L.I.M.B. mechs. Lose 1 reputation.

Title: Workers Health Care
Description: Workers are requesting better health care options. This will cost the company $7M but will make your employees much happier.

Title: Give a speech
Description: Give an internal speech to your employees about how well the company is doing. Discuss promotions, stock options, and increased funding to departments. Botnet will gain $1M, your employees will be slightly happier, and your cybersecurity will slightly improve.

Title: Change Security Software
Description: Gain $4M by switching to a more budget-friendly software for storing secrets. This will slightly increase the chance of a cyber attack in the future.

Title: Rush Out New Security System
Description: Cybersecurity has been hard pressed to deploy a new security system before the annual Altanaduran Tech Conference, but they don't think it'll be ready in time. Tell them to deploy it anyways so Botnet can present it at the conference and gain 2 reputation, but Botnet will be a little more vulnerable to cyber attacks in the future.
